title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 305.3 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 305.3 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part, the terms listed in this section shall
have the following meanings: (a) Preventive alcoholism counseling. Individual and group counseling and didactic
education regarding alcohol and its effects, assistance in the provision by
other staff of activities, experience and therapies, general guidance, support
and service coordination which is provided to a person at special risk in order
to prevent alcoholism, alcohol abuse and related problems. (b) Child. Any person under 18 years of age
who is not married and is not a parent. (c) Parent. A natural of adoptive parent; a
legal guardian. (d) Qualified
professional. A physician, nurse, credentialed alcoholism counselor, certified
social worker, or a licensed psychologist, as defined in section 330.3(j) of
this Chapter. Notes

305.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
